bearish_factors: FOMC announcement at 2pm - elevated event risk
VIX term structure inverting - near-term fear
decisions.rationale: Buying SPY Feb 20 2026 $560 puts as portfolio hedge ahead of FOMC. Protective position to offset long equity exposure. Max loss is premium ($850 for 2 contracts).

plan_rationale: Portfolio hedge: SPY puts to protect against downside risk during FOMC. Not a directional bet - insurance against adverse move. Position sized as ~1% of portfolio.
